column2: "Because he has Luther's face, I often find myself lost. But he's right."
"Ephimera, a flower that bears no fruit and corrupts the world. It disappears with <%me>'s Photons. This flower..."
"I think you know it well, but it's the crystal of a Darker infection. It's part of the [Profound Darkness]."
"Through Ephimera, the [Profound Darkness] will revive itself..."
"We cannot leave this be... It seems the decision to cooperate with Harriet was the right answer after all."
